title: Tactical Competency Enhancement Program Through Australian Rules Football Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Australian Rules Football Regulations and Game Operations, Intermediate-Level Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Real-time simulation analysis using digital devices (tablets/laptops) combined with offline team training

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 85% tactical decision-making accuracy under conditions similar to actual AFL matches (spatial/temporal constraints).
Team pass network analysis improves centralization index (indegree variability) by 30%, enabling flexible offensive/defensive systems.
Learners can identify at least five differences between simulation environments and actual matches and propose improvements.

resources: Australian Rules Football Stadium Simulation Software
Wearable Tracker Equipment (for Player Movement Analysis)
Collaborative Analytics Tool (Team Pass Network Visualization)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
